description: Sent when the mach invocation is completed (regardless of result). Contains information about the mach invocation that was made, its result, and some details about the current environment and hardware.
name: usage

metrics.name: mach.argv
metrics.description: Parameters provided to mach. Absolute paths are sanitized to be relative to one of a few key base paths, such as the "$topsrcdir", "$topobjdir", or "$HOME". For example: "/home/mozilla/dev/firefox/python/mozbuild" would be replaced with "$topsrcdir/python/mozbuild". If a valid replacement base path cannot be found, the path is replaced with "<path omitted>".

metrics.name: mach.command
metrics.description: The name of the mach command that was invoked, such as "build", "doc", or "try".

metrics.name: mach.duration
metrics.description: How long it took for the command to complete.

metrics.name: mach.success
metrics.description: True if the mach invocation succeeded.

metrics.name: mach.system.cpu_brand
metrics.description: CPU brand string from CPUID.

metrics.name: mach.system.distro
metrics.description: The name of the operating system distribution.

metrics.name: mach.system.distro_version
metrics.description: The high-level OS version.

metrics.name: mach.system.logical_cores
metrics.description: Number of logical CPU cores present.

metrics.name: mach.system.memory
metrics.description: Amount of system memory.

metrics.name: mach.system.physical_cores
metrics.description: Number of physical CPU cores present.

metrics.name: mach.system.ssh_connection
metrics.description: True if the current shell is a remote SSH connection.

metrics.name: mach.system.vscode_terminal
metrics.description: True if the current terminal is opened via Visual Studio Code.

metrics.name: mozbuild.artifact
metrics.description: True if `--enable-artifact-builds`.

metrics.name: mozbuild.ccache
metrics.description: True if `--with-ccache`.

metrics.name: mozbuild.clobber
metrics.description: True if the build was a clobber/full build.

metrics.name: mozbuild.compiler
metrics.description: The compiler type in use (CC_TYPE), such as "clang" or "gcc".

metrics.name: mozbuild.debug
metrics.description: True if `--enable-debug`.

metrics.name: mozbuild.icecream
metrics.description: True if icecream in use.

metrics.name: mozbuild.opt
metrics.description: True if `--enable-optimize`.

metrics.name: mozbuild.sccache
metrics.description: True if ccache in use is sccache.

metrics.name: app_build
metrics.description:
The build identifier generated by the CI system (e.g. "1234/A").
For language bindings that provide automatic detection for this value,
(e.g. Android/Kotlin), in the unlikely event that the build identifier
can not be retrieved from the OS, it is set to "inaccessible". For other
language bindings, if the value was not provided through configuration,
this metric gets set to `Unknown`.

metrics.name: app_channel
metrics.description: The channel the application is being distributed on.

metrics.name: app_display_version
metrics.description:
The user visible version string (e.g. "1.0.3").

In the unlikely event that the display version can not be retrieved,
it is set to "inaccessible".

metrics.name: architecture
metrics.description: The architecture of the device, (e.g. "arm", "x86").

metrics.name: client_id
metrics.description: A UUID uniquely identifying the client.

metrics.name: device_manufacturer
metrics.description:
The manufacturer of the device the application is running on.
Not set if the device manufacturer can't be determined (e.g. on Desktop).

metrics.name: device_model
metrics.description:
The model of the device the application is running on.
On Android, this is Build.MODEL, the user-visible marketing name,
like "Pixel 2 XL".
Not set if the device model can't be determined (e.g. on Desktop).

metrics.name: first_run_date
metrics.description: The date of the first run of the application.

metrics.name: glean.error.invalid_label
metrics.description:
Counts the number of times a metric was set with an invalid label.
The labels are the `category.name` identifier of the metric.

metrics.name: glean.error.invalid_overflow
metrics.description:
Counts the number of times a metric was set a value that overflowed.
The labels are the `category.name` identifier of the metric.

metrics.name: glean.error.invalid_state
metrics.description:
Counts the number of times a timing metric was used incorrectly.
The labels are the `category.name` identifier of the metric.

metrics.name: glean.error.invalid_value
metrics.description:
Counts the number of times a metric was set to an invalid value.
The labels are the `category.name` identifier of the metric.

metrics.name: locale
metrics.description:
The locale of the application during initialization (e.g. "es-ES").
If the locale can't be determined on the system, the value is
["und"](https://unicode.org/reports/tr35/#Unknown_or_Invalid_Identifiers),
to indicate "undetermined".

metrics.name: os
metrics.description:
The name of the operating system.
Possible values:
Android, iOS, Linux, Darwin, Windows,
FreeBSD, NetBSD, OpenBSD, Solaris, unknown

metrics.name: os_version
metrics.description:
The user-visible version of the operating system (e.g. "1.2.3"). If the
version detection fails, this metric gets set to `Unknown`.

metrics.name: android_sdk_version
metrics.description:
The optional Android specific SDK version of the software running on this
hardware device.
